text: Samsung Galaxy A72 is a smartphone developed and made by Samsung that was released in March 17, 2021. It has a Infinity-O display, 64MP, 12MP, 8MP and 5 MP rear cameras, 5000mAh battery capacity and IP67 waterproofing. == References == Category:Samsung Galaxy A-series Category:Mobile phones with multiple rear cameras Category:Mobile phones with 4K video recording Category:Mobile phones introduced in 2021
title: Samsung Galaxy A72
